title: Break Ups & Breakthroughs
description:
Jillian and the crew give advice on how to deal with a breakup in the age of social media. Plus, actionable steps to weight loss, and VERO’s co-founder Ayman Hariri talks about his new social app meant to empower rather than enslave us.


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ


This week’s sponsor codes:

THIRDLOVE.com/jillian for 15% off your first order

ROTHYS.com, promo code jillian to get your new favorite flats & free shipping
